description: This file contains a React-based implementation of a Tic Tac Toe game, including components for the game board, individual squares, and the main App component managing game logic and state. It also defines theme styling and utility functions.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Utility function to determine the winner of the Tic Tac Toe game based on the current board state.

methods.name: Square
methods.description: React component representing a clickable game cell with styling and accessibility attributes.

methods.name: Board
methods.description: React component rendering a 3x3 grid of Squares, representing the game board.
